thread.title: The Big Secret of Abortion: Women Already Know How It Works
thread.title_full: The Big Secret of Abortion: Women Already Know How It Works

author: Amanda Duberman
title: The Big Secret of Abortion: Women Already Know How It Works
text:
The Big Secret of Abortion: Women Already Know How It Works The Cut Posted: 08/10/2015 11:02 AM EDT The Washington Post/Getty Images 
“I gave birth to two premature kids,” said California’s Barbara Boxer on the Senate floor last week, during the debate over cutting federal funds to Planned Parenthood . Boxer sounded impatient, irritated. “I just don’t like lectures by men about what it’s like.”
